Next Space Setup.code:
; NAME: Next Space Setup
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP

LI A0 -1
LI A1 2
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0


LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Drink Intro.code:
; NAME: Drink Intro
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|SpaceToFace
; PARAM: +Number|StartingShopInventory
; PARAM: +Number|StartingPlayerDrinks

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW S0 108(SP) ; Space Coords to Spawn
SW S4 112(SP) ; Model Pointer
SW RA 116(SP)



LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T0 0(T0)
LI T1 1

BNE T0 T1 exit ; If it's not Turn 1, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

BNE V0 R0 exit ; If it's not P1, exit
NOP

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16 ; Sleep 16 Frames

; ==GET MODEL SPACE DATA==
LI A0 SpaceToFace
JAL GetSpaceData
NOP
MOVE S0 V0

; ==GET MODEL DATA FROM POINTER==
LI A0 58 ; Millenium Star Model
JAL 0x800D90C8
LI A1 0

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy to S4

; ==PUT MODEL ON SPACE==
MOVE A1 S0
ADDIU A1 A1 8
MOVE A0 V0
ADDIU A0 A0 12 
JAL 0x80089A20 ; SetModelOnBoard
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x157 ; Sparkly Sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20

LI A0 5
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 8 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 SpaceToFace

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 8

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x159 ; Ho! Ho! Ho! 

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x16 ; Character image (Millenium Star)
LUI A1 hi(Drinks_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Drinks_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x16 ; Character image (Millenium Star)
LUI A1 hi(Warning_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Warning_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI T0 StartingPlayerDrinks ; Players start at 7 Drinks
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD0A1)
SB T0 0(T1)
SB T0 1(T1)
SB T0 2(T1)
SB T0 3(T1)

LI T0 StartingShopInventory ; 12 Drinks at the Shop
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD09A)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD09A) ; Drink Shop Inventory Address
SB T0 0(T1)

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

JAL 0x800D9B54 ; Removes Millenium Star Model from the board
MOVE A0 S4 ; Millenium Star Model Pointer

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x157 ; Sparkly Sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 8 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 8

JAL Main
NOP


exit:
LW S0 108(SP) ; Space Coords to Spawn
LW S4 112(SP) ; Model Pointer
LW RA 116(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120

.align 16
Drinks_Message:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Standard padding for picture
.ascii "Oh dear"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Newline+Standard padding for picture
.ascii "I almost forgot"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Newline+Standard padding for picture
.ascii "Here"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " 7"
.byte 0x08 ; White Font
.ascii " drinks"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

.align 16
Warning_Message:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Standard padding for picture
.ascii "It"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ll be hard to traverse"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Newline+Standard padding for picture
.ascii "this desert without these"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Newline+Standard padding for picture
.ascii "You"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "d be slowed down for sure"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

.align 16
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW S1 0x0048(SP)
SW S0 0x0044(SP)
SW S4 0x004C(SP)
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T1 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T1) ;  Window ID

LI T0 -1
SB T0 0(T1) ; First problematic item RAM Address
SB T0 1(T1)
SB T0 2(T1) 


LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)
ADDIU s0, s0, lo(CharacterNamesNormal)
SLL a0, a0, 0x0004 ;multiply character ID by 0x10
ADDU v0, a0, s0 ;pointer to character name is on v0 now
LW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
CharacterNamesNormal:
.asciiz "MARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "LUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "PEACH"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "YOSHI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DK"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WALUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DAISY"

/**
CharactersEnum
{
0x00 - Mario
0x01 - Luigi
0x02 - Peach
0x03 - Yoshi
0x04 - Wario
0x05 - DK
0x06 - Waluigi
0x07 - Daisy
}
**/
.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

Drink Shop.code:
; NAME: Drink Shop
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: +Number|MaxDrinkAmount
; PARAM: +Number|MaxShopInventory
; PARAM: +Number|DrinkPrice

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP) ; Flag for exit ; Drink Count to Purchase Display
SW S1 108(SP) ; Drink Shop Inventory Count Address
SW S2 104(SP) ; Drink Shop Inventory Value
SW S7 100(SP) ; Message to Load
SW S4 96(SP) ; Current Player's Index
SW S5 92(SP) ; Drink Cost to Display
SW S3 88(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Value
SW S6 84(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Address
SW FP 80(SP) ; Max Amount of Drinks player can purchase



START:
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T0 0(T0)

LUI T1 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(total_turns)
LBU T1 0(T1)

BEQ T0 T1 lastturn
NOP

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD09A)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD09A) ; Shop Inventory Address 
LBU S2 0(S1)

BEQ S2 R0 ShopClosed
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S6 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S6 S6 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S6 S6 S4 ; S6 now holds current player's drink count address
LBU S3 0(S6) ; S3 now holds current player's drink count value

LI T0 MaxDrinkAmount
BEQ T0 S3 TooManyDrinks
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 DrinkPrice

BEQ V0 R0 NotEnoughCoins
NOP

LUI A0 hi(TotalDrinkCount_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(TotalDrinkCount_String) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
MOVE A2 S2 ; Value to convert
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0

LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 0 ; no exit

TooManyDrinks:
LUI A1 hi(TooManyDrinks_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TooManyDrinks_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 1 ; exit after message

NotEnoughCoins:
LUI A1 hi(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 1 ; exit after message

lastturn:
LUI A1 hi(LastTurn_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(LastTurn_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 1 ; exit after message

ShopClosed:
LI T2 MaxShopInventory
SB T2 0(S1) ; Brings Drink Inventory back to max
LUI A1 hi(OutOfInventory_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(OutOfInventory_Message)
LI S7 1 ; exit after message

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3D ; Character image (Monty Mole)
LUI A2 hi(TotalDrinkCount_String)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(TotalDrinkCount_String)
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AIChoice ; AI's Choice at V0
NOP

LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the receiver index

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S7 R0 exit
NOP

BEQ S0 R0 yes
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S0 T0 no
NOP

JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

yes:
LI S5 DrinkPrice ; Cost for Drinks Display
LI S0 1 ; Drinks to Purchase Display

LI T0 MaxDrinkAmount
LI T9 1 ; Subtract 1 from Max amount to see
SUBU T0 T0 T9
BEQ S3 T0 PrintStrings
LI FP 1 ; Player can only buy 1 Drink

LI T4 MaxDrinkAmount
SUBU FP T4 S3 ; FP = Amount of drinks player needs to max
ADDIU T6 S2 1 ; T6 = Shop Inventory + 1 for SLT below
maxdrinkinventoryloop:
SLT T5 FP T6 ; T5 = 1 if the Shop has the amount needed
BEQ T5 R0 shoplacksinventory
NOP ; ELSE means Shop has the needed drinks to max 
maxdrinkcoinloop:
MULT FP S5 ; multiply drink amount by price, result on lo
MFLO T7 ; move result to T7

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; 1 IF player can afford max drinks?
MOVE A1 T7

BEQ V0 R0 nocoins
NOP ; ELSE means they can afford max drinks

J PrintStrings
NOP

nocoins:
J maxdrinkcoinloop
ADDIU FP FP -1

shoplacksinventory:
J maxdrinkinventoryloop
ADDIU FP FP -1

PrintStrings:
LUI A0 hi(DrinkCountSelection_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(DrinkCountSelection_String) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
MOVE A2 S0 ; Value to convert
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0

LUI A0 hi(Cost_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Cost_String) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
MOVE A2 S5 ; Value to convert
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0 

LUI A1 hi(DrinkSelection_Window)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DrinkSelection_Window)
J DisplayMessage2
NOP

no:
LUI A1 hi(Goodbye_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Goodbye_Message)
LI S7 7 ; exit after message

DisplayMessage2:
LUI T1 hi(Cost_String)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(Cost_String) 
SW T1 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3D ; Character image (Monty Mole)
LI A2 0
LUI A3 hi(DrinkCountSelection_String)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(DrinkCountSelection_String) 
JAL 0x800EC92C  ; ShowMessage2
NOP
SW A0 76(SP)

LI T2 7
BEQ S7 T2 exitclose
NOP

JAL PlayerIsCPU ; Returns 1 if the current player is a CPU
MOVE A0 S4

BNE V0 R0 checkcpudrinks
NOP

LoopReturn:
JAL DetectCStickInput ; V0 = 1 if Stick is Up, -1 if Down, ELSE 0
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 Loop
NOP

LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 CheckMax
NOP
J CheckMin
NOP

; S0 = Drink Count to Purchase (USED)
; S1 = Shop Inventory Address
; S2 = Shop Inventory Value
; S3 = Player's Drink Count Value
; S4 = Current Player's Index
; S5 = Coin Amount to Pay (USED) 
; S6 = Current Player's Drink Count Address
; S7 = Current Player's Coin Amount
; FP = Max Amount of Drinks the player can purchase

CheckMax:
BNE S0 FP ContinueNormal
NOP
LI S0 1 ; Make the display 1 Drink
LI S5 DrinkPrice ; Make the display base price
J ContinueRefresh
NOP

CheckMin:
LI T3 1 ; If the Display is 1 Drink when they press Down...
BNE S0 T3 ContinueNormal
NOP
MOVE S0 FP
LI T4 DrinkPrice
MULT T4 FP
MFLO S5
J ContinueRefresh
NOP

ContinueNormal:
ADDU S0 S0 V0
LI T0 DrinkPrice
MULT T0 S0
MFLO S5

ContinueRefresh:
LUI A0 hi(DrinkCountSelection_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(DrinkCountSelection_String)
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf
MOVE A2 S0

LUI A0 hi(Cost_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Cost_String)
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf
MOVE A2 S5 

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 582 ; Coin Sound

JAL SleepVProcess
NOP

Loop:
JAL DetectABInput ; V0 = 1 if A press, 2 if B press, ELSE 0
NOP

LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 exitloop
NOP
BEQ V0 R0 ContinueInLoop
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 4 ; Back Sound Index

JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
MOVE S2 S6
J START
NOP

ContinueInLoop:
LW A0 76(SP)
LUI A1 hi(DrinkCountSelection_String)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DrinkCountSelection_String)
JAL 0x8005B6BC ; Updates Parameter?
MOVE A2 R0

LW A0 76(SP)
LUI A1 hi(Cost_String)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Cost_String)
JAL 0x8005B6BC ; Updates Parameter?
MOVE A2 R0

LW A0 76(SP)
LUI A1 hi(DrinkSelection_Window)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DrinkSelection_Window)
LI A2 -1
JAL 0x8005B43C ; Updates Message Window?
LI A3 -1

JAL SleepVProcess
NOP

J LoopReturn
NOP

checkcpudrinks:
MOVE S0 FP ; max amount purchaseable 
LI T0 2
MULTU T0 FP
MFLO S5 ; Price for Drinks

exitloop:
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 583 ; Cash Register Sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Sleep 10 frames


continuedrinkshop:
MOVE A0 S4
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S5

MOVE A0 S4
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S5

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames

SUBU S2 S2 S0 ; S2 loses the purchased drinks
ADDU S3 S3 S0 ; S3 gains the purchased drinks

LUI A0 hi(AfterPurchaseDrinkCount_String)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(AfterPurchaseDrinkCount_String) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
MOVE A2 S2 ; Value to convert
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(AfterPurchaseDrinkCount_String)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(AfterPurchaseDrinkCount_String)
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW T0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3D ; Character image (Monty Mole)
LUI A1 hi(AfterPurchase_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(AfterPurchase_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

SB S2 0(S1) 
SB S3 0(S6)

JAL Main
NOP
J exit
NOP

exitclose:
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP


exit:
LW RA 116(SP)
LW S0 112(SP) ; Flag for exit ; Drink Count to Purchase Display
LW S1 108(SP) ; Drink Shop Inventory Count Address
LW S2 104(SP) ; Drink Shop Inventory Value
LW S7 100(SP) ; Message to Load
LW S4 96(SP) ; Current Player's Index
LW S5 92(SP) ; Drink Cost to Display
LW S3 88(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Value
LW S6 84(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Address
LW FP 80(SP) ; Max Amount of Drinks player can purchase
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120



percent_d:
.asciiz "%d"

.align 8
TotalDrinkCount_String:
.fill 8

.align 8
AfterPurchaseDrinkCount_String:
.fill 8

.align 8
DrinkCountSelection_String:
.fill 8

.align 8
Cost_String:
.fill 8

.align 4
AIChoice:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LI V0 0

LW RA 36(SP)
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 4
DetectCStickInput:
ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 2(V0)

LUI T1 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI T2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT T2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Input Address
LBU V1 0(T1) ; Load address value into V0

LI T2 8
BEQ T2 V1 DetectCStickInputexit
LI V0 1 ; exits with 1 if up
LI T2 4
BEQ T2 V1 DetectCStickInputexit
LI V0 -1 ; exits with -1 if down
LI V0 0 ; ELSE 0

DetectCStickInputexit:
LW RA 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 56

.align 4

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 2(V0)

LUI T1 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI T2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT T2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Input Address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into A1

LI T1 0x80
BEQ T0 T1 DetectABInputexit
LI V0 1
LI T1 0x40
BEQ T0 T1 DetectABInputexit
LI V0 2

LI V0 0

DetectABInputexit:
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T1 0(T0)

LI T3 0x800CD09D 
LB T2 0(T3)

BNE T1 T2 drinkdisplayshowmessage ; Branch if Star changed location
SB T1 0(T3)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LB T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T0)
LI T1 -1
SB T1 0(T0)
SB T1 1(T0)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB T1 2(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
LB T1 0(T0)
LUI T0 hi(0x80105702) 
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105702) ; Window ID for cleanup calls?
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store the Window ID
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

;returns pointer to player name on v0

LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)

LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)

.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

NOP

NOP

ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter

Cactheevs.code:
; NAME: Cactheevs
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -88
SW RA 84(SP)
SW S2 80(SP) ; Drink Count Value
SW S1 76(SP) ; Drink Count Address
SW S0 72(SP) 


JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S1 S1 V0 ; Add player's index to get correct RAM address
LBU S2 0(S1) 

BEQ S2 R0 NothingHappens
NOP

JAL GetTurnAndPlacing ; Tier at V0
NOP

SLTI T0 V0 4 ; If it's the First 5 Turns
BNE T0 R0 Continue
LI S0 1 ; 1 Drink

SLTI T0 V0 6 ; If 1st/2nd during Midgame...
BNE T0 R0 Continue
LI S0 2 ; 2 Drinks

SLTI T0 V0 8 ; If 3rd/4th during Midgame...
BNE T0 R0 Continue
LI S0 1 ; 1 Drink

LI T0 8 ; If 1st during Last 5 Turns...
BNE T0 R0 Continue
LI S0 3 ; 3 Drinks

SLTI T0 V0 11 ; If 2nd/3rd during Last 5 Turns...
BNE T0 R0 Continue
LI S0 2 ; 2 Drinks
LI S0 1 ; ELSE 1 Drink
J Continue
NOP

NothingHappens:
LUI A1 hi(NothingHappened_Message)
J DisplayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NothingHappened_Message)

Continue:
LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 4 ; Dizzy Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x38B ; Hit SFX

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 5

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 3(V0)
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x287 ; Add Mario's Despair Voice Index

SLT T0 S2 S0 ; ON IF the player has less drinks than they can lose
BNE T0 R0 MissingDrinks
NOP

J SubtractDrinks
SUBU S2 S2 S0

MissingDrinks:
LI S2 0 ; 0 Drinks left

SubtractDrinks:
SB S2 0(S1) 

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

LUI A1 hi(Stolen_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Stolen_Message)

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL Main
NOP


exit:
LW RA 84(SP)
LW S2 80(SP) ; Drink Count Value
LW S1 76(SP) ; Drink Count Address
LW S0 72(SP) 
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 88



.align 16
Stolen_Message:
.ascii "A"
.byte 0x03 ; Red Font
.ascii " Cactheef"
.byte 0x08 ; White Font
.ascii " stole your"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " drinks"
.byte 0x08,0x85,0xFF,0 ; White Font, Period, Pause

.align 16
NothingHappened_Message:
.ascii "Huh"
.byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
.ascii " Nothing happened"
.byte 0x85,0xFF,0 ; Period, Pause

.align 16
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T1 0(T0)

LI T3 0x800CD09D
LB T2 0(T3)

BNE T1 T2 drinkdisplayshowmessage ; Branch if Star changed location
SB T1 0(T3)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LB T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T0)
LI T1 -1
SB T1 0(T0)
SB T1 1(T0)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB T1 2(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
LB T1 0(T0)
LUI T0 hi(0x80105702) 
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105702) ; Window ID for cleanup calls?
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store the Window ID
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

GetTurnAndPlacing:
ADDIU SP SP -64
SW RA 60(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; At V0
NOP

JAL GetPlayerPlacementAtEndOfGame ; 0-3 at V0
MOVE A0 V0

LUI T1 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(current_turn) ; Loading address of current turn number
LBU T1 0(T1) ; Loading current turn number
LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns) ; Loading address of total turn number
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Loading total turn number

SLTI T3 T1 6 ; ON IF current turn is less than 6
BNE T3 R0 addplacing ; If it's less than 6, then it's Early Game, exit
LI T7 0 ; Early Game Value on T7

SUB T2 T0 T1
SLTI T3 T2 5 ; ON IF Total Turns - Current Turn = 4 or less
BNE T3 R0 addplacing ; If it's 4 or less, it's Lategame, exit
LI T7 8 ; Late Game Value on T7

LI T7 4 ; Mid Game Value on T7

addplacing:
MOVE V1 T7 ; V1 now contains Turn Tier
ADDU V0 T7 V0 ; Placing + Turn Tier at V0

LW RA 60(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 64

Sandstorm.code:
; NAME: Sandstorm
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|MainPath
; PARAM: Space|AltPath
; PARAM: Space|OasisPath

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S2 72(SP) ; Destination Chain Index
SW S3 68(SP) ; Destination Chain Space Index
SW S5 64(SP) ; Player Struct



LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LUI A1 hi(Sandstorm_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Sandstorm_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x1E4 ; Sandstorm Sound?

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 45

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP

SLTI T0 V0 86
BNE T0 R0 MainPath
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 171
BNE T0 R0 AltPath
NOP

LI S2 OasisPath_chain_index
J Warp
LI S3 OasisPath_chain_space_index

MainPath:
LI S2 MainPath_chain_index
J Warp
LI S3 MainPath_chain_space_index

AltPath:
LI S2 AltPath_chain_index
LI S3 AltPath_chain_space_index

Warp:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Player Index located at V0
NOP

MOVE A0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
MOVE A1 S2
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
MOVE A2 S3 ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LI A0 0
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16



LW RA 76(SP)
LW S2 72(SP) ; Destination Chain Index
LW S3 68(SP) ; Destination Chain Space Index
LW S5 64(SP) ; Player Struct
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80



.align 16
Sandstorm_Message:
.ascii "The sandstorm is raging"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Periods (...)
.byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
.ascii "Who knows where you"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ll end up"
.byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Pause

Maactus.code:
; NAME: Maactus
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S1 72(SP) ; Current Player's Item Slot Address
SW S3 68(SP) ; Answer Counter
SW S0 64(SP) ; exit flag
SW S6 60(SP) ; Question Counter
SW S5 56(SP) ; Item Index


LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T0 0(T0)

LUI T1 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(total_turns)
LBU T1 0(T1)

BEQ T0 T1 lastturn
NOP

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; At V0
LI A0 -1

ADDIU S1 V0 0x1A ; Current Player's third item slot address
LBU T2 0(S1) ; Item Value
LI T0 0xFF

BNE T0 T2 toomanyitems
NOP

LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S0 0 ; no exit

toomanyitems:
LUI A1 hi(TooManyItems_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TooManyItems_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S0 1 ; exit after message

lastturn:
LUI A1 hi(LastTurn_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(LastTurn_Message)
LI S0 1 ; exit after message

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S0 R0 exit
NOP

LI S3 0 ; Answer Counter
LI S6 0 ; Question Counter
LUI A1 hi(Question1_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Question1_Prompt)

LOOP:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AIDecision ; Returns AI Choice on V0
MOVE A0 S3

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0
ADDU S3 S3 V0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BEQ S6 R0 LoadQuestion2
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S6 T0 LoadQuestion3
NOP
J exitloop
NOP

LoadQuestion2:
LUI A1 hi(Question2_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Question2_Prompt)
J LOOP
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; add 1 to question counter

LoadQuestion3:
LUI A1 hi(Question3_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Question3_Prompt)
J LOOP
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; add 1 to question counter

exitloop:
JAL GetRandomByte  ; 0-255 at V0
NOP

BEQ S3 R0 table1
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S3 T0 table2
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S3 T0 table3
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S3 T0 table4
NOP
LI T0 4
BEQ S3 T0 table5
NOP
LI T0 5
BEQ S3 T0 table6
NOP
J table7
NOP

table1:
LUI A1 hi(Good3_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Good3_Message)
LI S0 0 ; no exit
SLTI T0 V0 31 
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 1 ; Skeleton Key
SLTI T0 V0 95
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 0xC ; Boo Repellant
SLTI T0 V0 169
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 0xE ; Magic Lamp
LUI A1 hi(Good4_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Good4_Message)
J DisplayMessage2
LI S0 1

table2:
LUI A1 hi(Good2_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Good2_Message)
LI S0 0 ; no exit
SLTI T0 V0 64
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 1 ; Skeleton Key
SLTI T0 V0 128
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 4 ; Cellular Shopper
SLTI T0 V0 192
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 8 ; Dueling Glove
J DisplayMessage2
LI S5 0xA ; Golden Mushroom

table3:
LUI A1 hi(Good1_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Good1_Message)
LI S0 0 ; no exit
SLTI T0 V0 143
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 1 ; Skeleton Key
SLTI T0 V0 200
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 5 ; Warp Block
J DisplayMessage2
LI S5 0 ; Mushroom

table4:
LUI A1 hi(Neutral_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Neutral_Message)
LI S0 0 ; no exit
SLTI T0 V0 41
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 1 ; Skeleton Key
SLTI T0 V0 77
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 4 ; Cellular Shopper
SLTI T0 V0 113
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 7 ; Bowser Phone
SLTI T0 V0 148
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 8 ; Dueling Glove
SLTI T0 V0 184
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 9 ; Lucky Lamp
SLTI T0 V0 220
BNE T0 R0 DisplayMessage2
LI S5 0xA ; Golden Mushroom
J DisplayMessage2
LI S5 3 ; Reverse Mushroom

table5:
LUI A1 hi(Evil1_Message)

NOP

LI T1 2

LI T1 0xFF ; No Item Value
BEQ S2 T1 giveitem ; Go to giveitem if the slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to load current player's second Item address

JAL PlaySound

LBU T0 3(V0)

LI A1 5 ; Joy Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Don't loop

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 30 ; Sleeps for 30 frames



exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S1 72(SP) ; Current Player's Item Slot Address
LW S3 68(SP) ; Answer Counter
LW S0 64(SP) ; exit flag
LW S6 60(SP) ; Question Counter
LW S5 56(SP) ; Item Index
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

Dehydration check.code:
; NAME: Dehydration check
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP) ; Loop Counter
SW S1 68(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count
SW S3 64(SP) ; Current Player's Forced Roll Address
SW S4 60(SP) ; Current Player's Index



JAL GetPlayerStruct ; At V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player 

LBU A0 15(V0) ; Chain Index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; at V0
LBU A1 16(V0) ; Chain Space Index

LUI T0 hi(SpaceArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(SpaceArray)
LUI A1 hi(Safe_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Safe_Message)
SpaceLoop:
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load the first Space Index of the Array

BEQ T1 R0 Continue ; if 0, exit
NOP

BEQ V0 T1 DisplayMessage
NOP

J SpaceLoop
ADDIU T0 T0 1

Continue:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S1 S1 V0 ; Add Current Player's Index to get Drink Count

LUI S3 hi(0x800CDBD2)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(0x800CDBD2) ; P1 Forced Roll Address

LI T2 0x4C ; Distance between each player's addresses
MULT V0 T2 ; Multiply Current Player Index by T2
MFLO T2 ; Move Result to T2
ADDU S3 S3 T2 ; Add to get current Player's Forced Roll address

LBU T0 0(S1)
BNE T0 R0 notdehydrated
NOP

LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter
LOOP:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Rand Int 0-99 at V0
NOP

LI T0 5
DIVU V0 T0 
MFHI T1
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; add 1 to get a 1-5 number
SB T1 0(S3) ; Store Forced Roll

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to the Loop Counter
LI T2 1
BNE S0 T2 LOOP ; exit when the counter hits 1 (Dehydrate 1 Dice Block only)
ADDIU S3 S3 1

LUI A1 hi(Dehydrated_Message)
J DisplayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Dehydrated_Message)


notdehydrated:
SB R0 0(S3)
SB R0 1(S3)
SB R0 2(S3) ; These will clear all forced rolls

LBU T0 0(S1)
ADDIU T0 T0 -1 ; Subtract 1 Drink from Count
SB T0 0(S1)

LUI A1 hi(DrankDrink_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DrankDrink_Message)

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL Main
NOP



LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S3 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80



.align 16
Dehydrated_Message:
.ascii "The harsh heat has left you\x03 dehydrated\x08\x85"
.byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
.asciiz "You can only move five spaces or less\x85\xFF"

.align 16
DrankDrink_Message:
.ascii "You drank one of your\x06 drinks\x08\x85"
.byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)

Safe_Message:
.ascii "The fresh atmosphere of the oasis is"
.byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
.asciiz "keeping your thirst at bay\x85\xFF"

.align 16
SpaceArray:
.byte 0x3F,0x38,0x3B,0x3D,0x42,0x3C,0x41,0x3A,0x40,0x39,0

.align 16
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LBU T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB A0 3(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
JAL 0x800EC9DC
LBU A0 0(T0)
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)
ADDIU s0, s0, lo(CharacterNamesNormal)
SLL a0, a0, 0x0004 ;multiply character ID by 0x10
ADDU v0, a0, s0 ;pointer to character name is on v0 now
LW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
CharacterNamesNormal:
.asciiz "MARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "LUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "PEACH"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "YOSHI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DK"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WALUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DAISY"

/**
CharactersEnum
{
0x00 - Mario
0x01 - Luigi
0x02 - Peach
0x03 - Yoshi
0x04 - Wario
0x05 - DK
0x06 - Waluigi
0x07 - Daisy
}
**/
.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

Professor C. Saguar.code:
; NAME: Professor C. Saguar
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Star

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S3 64(SP)



LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S1 S1 V0 ; This loads Current Player's Drink Count Address

LBU T0 0(S1)

SLTI T1 T0 4 ; 1 if player has 3 drinks or less
BEQ T1 R0 enoughdrinks
NOP

LUI A1 hi(NotEnoughDrinks_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NotEnoughDrinks_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S3 1 ; exit after Message

enoughdrinks:
LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
LI S3 0 ; no exit

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S3 R0 exit ; exit if flag is on
NOP
PromptSetup:
LUI A1 hi(Machine_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Machine_Prompt)

DisplayMessage2:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0
MOVE S0 V0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S3 R0 exit ; exit if flag is on
NOP

BEQ S0 R0 yes
NOP
LI T1 1

Main:

SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr

SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr

SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T1 0(T0)

LI T3 0x800CD09D
LB T2 0(T3)

BNE T1 T2 drinkdisplayshowmessage ; Branch if Star changed location
SB T1 0(T3)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LB T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T0)
LI T1 -1
SB T1 0(T0)
SB T1 1(T0)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB T1 2(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
LB T1 0(T0)
LUI T0 hi(0x80105702) 
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105702) ; Window ID for cleanup calls?
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store the Window ID
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0

SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)

.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

Blooper-Go-Round.code:
; NAME: Blooper-Go-Round
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: +Number|MaxDrinkAmount

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S3 64(SP)
SW S6 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S7 52(SP)
SW S2 48(SP)



JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S6 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S6 S6 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S6 S6 S4 ; S6 now holds current player's drink count address
LBU S3 0(S6) ; S3 now holds current player's drink count value

LI T0 MaxDrinkAmount
BEQ S3 T0 TooManyDrinks
NOP

LI A0 0x3A ; Character image (Blooper)
LUI A1 hi(Speen_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Speen_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 0 ; no exit

TooManyDrinks:
LI A0 0x3A ; Character image (Blooper)
LUI A1 hi(TooManyDrinks_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TooManyDrinks_Message)
LI S7 1 ; exit after message

DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI T0 1
BEQ S7 T0 exit
NOP
LI T2 2
BEQ S7 T2 continue
NOP
LI T2 3
BEQ S7 T2 calcdrinks
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LUI A1 hi(Explanation_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Explanation_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 2

continue:
LI A0 4 ; Happening Fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

JAL PlayerIsCPU ; returns 1 if CPU
MOVE A0 S4

BNE V0 R0 CalculateAIDrinks
NOP

LI S0 0 ; Start Loop at 0 Spins
LI S1 15 ; Flags for Stick Movement Press (1 1 1 1)
LI S2 150 ; Start Timer at 150 Frames (5 seconds) 
CHECKX:
BEQ S1 R0 add1
NOP
BEQ S2 R0 exitloop
NOP
JAL SleepVProcess
NOP
ADDIU S2 S2 -1 ; Reduce the Timer by 1 frame
JAL GetXAxisInput ; Stick Rotation Index at V0
NOP 

BEQ V0 R0 CHECKX
NOP

AND T0 S1 V0 
SUBU S1 S1 T0

CHECKY:
BEQ S1 R0 add1
NOP
BEQ S2 R0 exitloop
NOP
JAL SleepVProcess
NOP 
ADDIU S2 S2 -1 ; Reduce the Timer by 1 frame
JAL GetYAxisInput ; Stick Rotation Index at V0
NOP 

BEQ V0 R0 CHECKY
NOP

AND T0 S1 V0
SUBU S1 S1 T0

J CHECKX
NOP

add1:
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; +1 Spin
LI S1 15 ; Reset Stick Movement Flags

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x300 ; Splash Sound Index

J CHECKX
NOP

CalculateAIDrinks:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1
LBU T0 1(V0) ; CPU Difficulty loaded to T0

BEQ T0 R0 exitloop
LI S0 11 ; Easy
LI T2 1
BEQ T0 T2 exitloop
LI S0 19
LI T2 2
BEQ T0 T2 exitloop
LI S0 23
LI S0 32; Else Super Hard
J exitloop
NOP

exitloop:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16 ; Sleep for 16 frames

SLTI T0 S0 8 ; ON If the player spun less than 8 times
BEQ T0 R0 Yay
LI A0 0x3A ; Character image (Blooper)

LUI A1 hi(BlooperNay_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BlooperNay_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 1

Yay:
LUI A1 hi(BlooperYay_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BlooperYay_Message)
J DisplayMessage
LI S7 3

calcdrinks:
SLTI T0 S0 13 ; If they did 11-15 Spins...
BNE T0 R0 checkdrinkcap
LI S2 1  ; 1 Drink
SLTI T0 S0 18 ; If they did 16-20 Spins...
BNE T0 R0 checkdrinkcap
LI S2 2 ; 2 Drinks
SLTI T0 S0 23 ; If they did 21-25 Spins...
BNE T0 R0 checkdrinkcap
LI S2 3 ; 3 Drinks
SLTI T0 S0 28 ; If they did 26-30 Spins...
BNE T0 R0 checkdrinkcap
LI S2 4 ; 4 Drinks
;SLTI T0 S0 31 ; If they did 27-30 Spins...
;BNE T0 R0 checkdrinkcap
;LI S2 5 ; 5 Drinks
LI S2 5 ; ELSE give 5 drinks

checkdrinkcap:
ADDU S3 S3 S2 ; Add drinks to player's drink count
LI T2 MaxDrinkAmount
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; add 1 for SLT below
SLT T0 S3 T2 ; ON if the amount doesn't surpass drink limit
BNE T0 R0 givedrinks
NOP
LI S3 MaxDrinkAmount ; The player is maxed out on drinks

givedrinks:
SB S3 0(S6) ; Give Drinks to the player

finish:
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 5 ; Jumping Joy Animation Index
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Don't repeat animation

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1
LBU T0 3(V0)

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x275 ; Mario's Happy Voice Index

JAL SleepVProcess
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x83 ; some sound for obtaining water /shrug

JAL Main
NOP

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 30 ; Sleeps for 30 frames



exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S3 64(SP)
LW S6 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S7 52(SP)
LW S2 48(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 4
GetXAxisInput:
ADDIU SP SP -24
SW RA 16(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 2(V0)

LUI T1 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI T2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT T2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Input Address
LBU V0 0(T1) ; Load address value into V0

LI T2 1
BEQ T2 V0 GetXAxisInput_exit
NOP
LI T2 2
BEQ T2 V0 GetXAxisInput_exit
NOP
LI V0 0

GetXAxisInput_exit:
LW RA 16(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 24

.align 4
GetYAxisInput:
ADDIU SP SP -20
SW RA 16(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 2(V0)

LUI T1 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI T2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT T2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Input Address
LBU V0 0(T1) ; Load address value into V0

LI T2 4
BEQ T2 V0 GetYAxisInput_exit
NOP
LI T2 8
BEQ T2 V0 GetYAxisInput_exit
NOP
LI V0 0

GetYAxisInput_exit:
LW RA 16(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 20

SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;

JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T1 0(T0)

LI T3 0x800CD09D
LB T2 0(T3)

BNE T1 T2 drinkdisplayshowmessage ; Branch if Star changed location
SB T1 0(T3)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LB T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T0)
LI T1 -1
SB T1 0(T0)
SB T1 1(T0)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB T1 2(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
LB T1 0(T0)
LUI T0 hi(0x80105702) 
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105702) ; Window ID for cleanup calls?
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store the Window ID
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)
ADDIU s0, s0, lo(CharacterNamesNormal)
SLL a0, a0, 0x0004 ;multiply character ID by 0x10
ADDU v0, a0, s0 ;pointer to character name is on v0 now
LW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
CharacterNamesNormal:
.asciiz "MARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "LUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "PEACH"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "YOSHI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DK"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WALUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DAISY"

/**
CharactersEnum
{
0x00 - Mario
0x01 - Luigi
0x02 - Peach
0x03 - Yoshi
0x04 - Wario
0x05 - DK
0x06 - Waluigi
0x07 - Daisy
}
**/
.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

Dead-End Reverse Fix (v3.5 Left).code:
; NAME: Dead-End Reverse Fix (v3.5 Left)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Behind
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|Behind2

ADDIU SP SP -52
SW RA 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP) 
SW S2 36(SP)
SW S3 32(SP)



JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADDU S0 R0 R0

LUI S1 hi(p1_status_flags)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_status_flags)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckStatus
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(p2_status_flags)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p2_status_flags)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckStatus
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(p3_status_flags)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p3_status_flags)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckStatus
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(p4_status_flags)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p4_status_flags)

CheckStatus:
LI S2 0x81
ADDU S3 R0 S1
LBU S1 0(S1)
BEQ S2 S1 CheckChainIndex
NOP
J exit
NOP

CheckChainIndex:
ADDU S0 R0 R0

LUI S1 hi(0x800D111D) ; Player 1 Reverse Chain Index
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800D111D)
LUI S2 hi(0x800D111E) ; Player 1 Reverse Space Index
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(0x800D111E)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckChain
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(0x800D1155) 
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800D1155)
LUI S2 hi(0x800D1156)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(0x800D1156)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckChain
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(0x800D118D)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800D118D)
LUI S2 hi(0x800D118E)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(0x800D118E)

BEQ S0 V0 CheckChain
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1

LUI S1 hi(0x800D11C5)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800D11C5)
LUI S2 hi(0x800D11C6)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(0x800D11C6)


CheckChain:
LBU S1 0(S1)
LBU S2 0(S2)
ADDIU S0 R0 Behind_chain_index
BNE S0 S1 CheckChain2
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 Behind_chain_space_index
BNE S0 S2 CheckChain2
NOP
J SetupSpace
NOP

CheckChain2:
ADDIU S0 R0 Behind2_chain_index
BNE S0 S1 exit
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 Behind2_chain_space_index
BNE S0 S2 exit
NOP

SetupSpace:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Behind_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Behind_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace 
NOP

LI S0 0x80
SB S0 0(S3)


exit:
LW S1 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP) 
LW S2 36(SP)
LW S3 32(SP)
LW RA 48(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 52

Cactheef Drink Steal.code:
; NAME: Cactheef Drink Steal
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: +Number|MinCoins
; PARAM: +Number|Tier2
; PARAM: +Number|Tier3
; PARAM: +Number|MaxDrinkAmount

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP) ; Flag for exit ; Drink Count to Purchase Display
SW S1 108(SP) ;
SW S2 104(SP) ; 
SW S7 100(SP) ; Max amount of Drinks to steal
SW S4 96(SP) ; Current Player's Index
SW S5 92(SP) ; Target Player's Index
SW S3 88(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Value 
SW S6 84(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Address
SW FP 80(SP) ; Timer



START:
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A3 2 ; Loop

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

JAL CheckDehydratedOpponents
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index

LUI A1 hi(NobodyHasDrinks_Message)
BEQ V0 R0 DisplayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NobodyHasDrinks_Message)

LUI S6 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S6 S6 lo(0x800CD0A1) ; Load P1's DrinkAddress
ADDU S6 S6 S4 ; Add Cur. Player's Index to get Cur. Player's Address
LBU S3 0(S6) ; Load Current Player's Drink Count Value 

LI T0 MaxDrinkAmount
LUI A1 hi(TooManyDrinks_Message)
BEQ S3 T0 DisplayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TooManyDrinks_Message)

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Check if player can afford the lowest tier
LI A1 MinCoins

BNE V0 R0 DisplayMessage2
NOP

LUI A1 hi(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
DisplayMessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI A0 -1 ; (No character image)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

DisplayMessage2:
JAL GetColorFormatter 
NOP ; returns color for 2nd and 3rd option on V0 and V1

LUI A0 hi(A_Pointer_with_enough_space)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(A_Pointer_with_enough_space) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Prompt) ; String Format
MOVE A2 V0 ; 2nd Option Color
MOVE A3 V1 ; 3rd Option Color
JAL sprintf ; Creates String 
SW R0 16(SP) ; terminator 

SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI A0 -1 ; (No character image)
LUI A1 hi(A_Pointer_with_enough_space)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(A_Pointer_with_enough_space)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL DisableOptions ; A0 has Window ID
MOVE A1 S4

JAL AIDecision ; Returns AI Choice on V0
NOP

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0
MOVE S0 V0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BEQ S0 R0 SecondPrompt
LI S2 MinCoins ; 10 Coins
LI T0 1
BEQ S0 T0 SecondPrompt
LI S2 Tier2 ; 15 Coins
LI T0 2
BEQ S0 T0 SecondPrompt
LI S2 Tier3 ; 20 Coins
LI T0 3
LUI A1 hi(Rejection_Message)
BEQ S0 T0 DisplayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Rejection_Message)
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J DisplayMessage2
NOP

SecondPrompt:
JAL GetNameColorFormatter ; in T1, T3, T4, and T5 
MOVe A0 S4 ; Pass Current Player's Index

LUI A0 hi(A_Pointer_with_enough_space2)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(A_Pointer_with_enough_space2) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(SelectOpponent_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SelectOpponent_Prompt) ; String Format
MOVE A2 T1 ; P1 Color
MOVE A3 T3 ; P2 Color
SW T4 16(SP) ; P3 Color
SW T5 20(SP) ; P4 Color
JAL sprintf ; Creates String  
SW R0 24(SP) ; terminator byte

JAL GetPlayerCharacterString ; At V0, V1, T2, and T0
NOP 

SW R0 24(SP)
LI A0 -1 ; (No character image)
LUI A1 hi(A_Pointer_with_enough_space2)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(A_Pointer_with_enough_space2)
MOVE A2 V0 ; P1 Name
MOVE A3 V1 ; P2 Name
SW T2 16(SP) ; P3 Name
JAL ShowMessage
SW T0 20(SP) ; P4 Name
 
; A0 is Window ID, returned by ShowMessage on A0
JAL DisableDehydratedPlayers
MOVE A1 S4 ; Current Player's Index

JAL PlayerIsCPU ; 1 if CPU
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player Index

ADDIU V0 V0 3 ; add 3 so they choose Your Choice

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0
MOVE S0 V0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI T0 4 ; Your Choice Option Index
BEQ S0 T0 randomchoice
NOP
LI T0 5 ; Go Back Option Index
BEQ S0 T0 START
NOP
LI T0 6 ; View Map Option Index
BEQ S0 T0 viewmap
NOP

takecoins:
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S2 ; Coins to Pay

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 Frames

LI A0 0 ; Bar Code Fadeout
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 21

LUI T0 hi(current_player_index)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_player_index)
SB S0 0(T0) ; Change Current Player to the targeted player

LI A0 0 ; Bar Code Fadeout
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

JAL GetTargetPlayerCharacterString
MOVE A0 S0
MOVE S5 S0 ; Move Targeted Player Index to S5

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LUI A1 hi(Warning_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Warning_Message)
MOVE A2 V0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL PlayerIsCPU ; returns 1 if CPU
MOVE A0 S5 ; Is the targeted player a CPU?

BNE V0 R0 CalculateAIDrinks
NOP

LI S0 0 ; Start Loop at 0 Presses
LI S1 0xC0 ; Flags for A/B Press (1 1 0 0  0 0 0 0)
LI FP 150 ; Start Timer at 150 Frames (5 seconds) 
CHECKAB:
BEQ S1 R0 add1
NOP
BEQ FP R0 exitloop
NOP
JAL SleepVProcess
NOP
ADDIU FP FP -1 ; Reduce the Timer by 1 frame
JAL GetABInput ; Stick Rotation Index at V0
NOP 

BEQ V0 R0 CHECKAB
NOP

AND T0 S1 V0 ; If the Button Pressed Flag is ON--
SUBU S1 S1 T0 ; Remove the Flag

J CHECKAB
NOP

add1:
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; +1 Cycle
LI S1 0xC0 ; Reset A/B Flags

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x38B ; Hit SFX Index

J CHECKAB
NOP

CalculateAIDrinks:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1
LBU T0 1(V0) ; CPU Difficulty loaded to T0

BEQ T0 R0 exitloop
LI S0 24
LI T2 1
BEQ T0 T2 exitloop
LI S0 31
LI T2 2
BEQ T0 T2 exitloop
LI S0 36
LI S0 39; Else Super Hard
J exitloop
NOP

exitloop:
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI A0 0 ; Bar Code Fadeout
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 21

LUI T0 hi(current_player_index)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_player_index)
SB S4 0(T0) ; Change Current Player to the targeted player

LI A0 0 ; Bar Code Fadeout
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
LUI A1 hi(Goodbye_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Goodbye_Message) ;
LI A2 0x0
JAL ShowMessage ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; S3 Current Player's Drink Count
LI T6 MaxDrinkAmount
SUBU S7 T6 S3 ; S7 is current player's maximum steal amount

LI T0 10
BEQ T0 S2 needlerswindler
NOP
LI T0 20
BEQ T0 S2 pricklypickpocket
NOP

SLTI T0 S0 32 ; If 0-31 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 5 ; Lose 5 Drinks
SLTI T0 S0 39 ; If 32-38 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 4 ; Lose 4 Drinks
J continue
LI S2 3 ; Lose 3 Drinks

needlerswindler:
SLTI T0 S0 24 ; If 0-23 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 3 ; Lose 3 Drinks
SLTI T0 S0 31 ; If 24-30 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 2 ; Lose 2 Drinks
J continue
LI S2 1 ; Lose 1 Drinks

pricklypickpocket:
SLTI T0 S0 29 ; If 0-28 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 4 ; Lose 4 Drinks
SLTI T0 S0 36 ; If 29-35 Cycles
BNE T0 R0 continue
LI S2 3 ; Lose 3 Drinks

LI S2 2 ; Lose 2 Drinks

continue:
LUI T2 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU T2 T2 S5 ; Target Player's Drink Address
LB T3 0(T2) ; Target Player's Drink Count

ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to Drinks to lose for SLT below
SLT T0 S2 T3 ; ON IF the target player has the drinks to lose
BNE T0 R0 checkmaxamount
ADDIU T3 T3 -1 ; Minus 1 to bring back to normal 
MOVE S2 T3 ; Max amount the player can lose is current number

checkmaxamount:
ADDIU S7 S7 1 ; Add 1 to Drinks to lose for SLT below
SLT T0 S2 S7 ; ON IF receiving player can hold drinks
BNE T0 R0 handdrinks
ADDIU S7 S7 -1 ; Minus 1 to bring back to normal

MOVE S2 S7 

handdrinks:
SUBU T4 T3 S2 ; T4 = Target Player Drink - Drinks to lose
SB T4 0(T2)

ADDU T4 S3 S2 ; T4 = Current Player Drinks + Drinks to get
SB T4 0(S6)

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 5 ; Jumping Joy Animation Index
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Don't repeat animation

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1
LBU T0 3(V0)

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x275 ; Mario's Happy Voice Index

JAL SleepVProcess
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x83 ; some sound for obtaining water /shrug

JAL Main
NOP

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 30 ; Sleeps for 30 frames

J exit
NOP


randomchoice:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 at V0
NOP
LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0 ; MOD 4
MFHI S0 ; Remainder on S0

BEQ S0 S4 randomchoice ; if current player is selected, re-do
NOP
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD0A1) ; P1 Drink Address
ADDU T1 T1 S0 ; Add chosen player's index
LB T2 0(T1) ; Load chosen player's drink count
BEQ T2 R0 randomchoice ; if chosen player has 0, re-do
NOP

J takecoins
NOP

viewmap:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J SecondPrompt
NOP



exit:
LW S0 112(SP) ; Flag for exit ; Drink Count to Purchase Display
LW S1 108(SP) ; Drink Shop Inventory Count Address
LW S2 104(SP) ; 
LW S7 100(SP) ; Message to Load
LW S4 96(SP) ; Current Player's Index
LW S5 92(SP) ; Drink Cost to Display
LW S3 88(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Value
LW S6 84(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count Address
LW FP 80(SP) ; Max Amount of Drinks player can purchase
LW RA 116(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120
