Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T1 0(T0)

LI T3 0x800CD09D
LB T2 0(T3)

BNE T1 T2 drinkdisplayshowmessage ; Branch if Star changed location
SB T1 0(T3)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LB T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
SB A0 3(T0)
LI T1 -1
SB T1 0(T0)
SB T1 1(T0)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB T1 2(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
LB T1 0(T0)
LUI T0 hi(0x80105702) 
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105702) ; Window ID for cleanup calls?
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store the Window ID
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)
ADDIU s0, s0, lo(CharacterNamesNormal)
SLL a0, a0, 0x0004 ;multiply character ID by 0x10
ADDU v0, a0, s0 ;pointer to character name is on v0 now
LW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
CharacterNamesNormal:
.asciiz "MARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "LUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "PEACH"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "YOSHI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DK"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WALUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DAISY"

/**
CharactersEnum
{
0x00 - Mario
0x01 - Luigi
0x02 - Peach
0x03 - Yoshi
0x04 - Wario
0x05 - DK
0x06 - Waluigi
0x07 - Daisy
}
**/
.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string

Problematic Item Check.code:
; NAME: Problematic Item Check
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S4 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S1 60(SP)

LUI S0 hi(Item_Array)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(Item_Array)
LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) 
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5) ; Address for problematic item flag 1
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP 
MOVE S4 V0

LOOP:
LBU S2 0(S0) ; Load item index in the array
BEQ S2 R0 checkstarspawn
NOP

MOVE A0 S4 
JAL PlayerHasItem ; returns -1 if they don't have the item
MOVE A1 S2

LI T0 -1
BEQ V0 T0 LOOP ; Loop back if player doesn't have the item
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check next item in the array

SB S2 0(S1) ; Store Item Index on Board RAM
J LOOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; load next RAM address

checkstarspawn:
LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn)
LB T2 0(T0)

LI T1 0x800CD09D ; RAM for storing Current Star Spawn
SB T2 0(T1)



LW S1 60(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S4 68(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
Item_Array:
.byte 0x7,0x8,0x9,0xE,0x11,0

(Junction) Bottom Eye.code:
; NAME: (Junction) Bottom Eye
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Left
; PARAM: Space|Right

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S4 72(SP)
SW S3 68(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1
MOVE S4 V0 

LBU T0 23(S4) ; Status Flags
SRL T0 T0 7 ; Shift bits to the right by 7 for Reverse flag
BNEZ T0 exit ; exit if player is in reverse
NOP

JAL PlayerIsCPU
LI A0 -1 

BEQZ V0 exit ; If 0, exit because it's a human
NOP

LBU S3 1(S4) ; Load CPU's Difficulty (0-3)

LBU T1 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A1) ; Drink Count Address
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; T0 now holds current player's drink count address
LBU T2 0(T0) ; T2 now holds current player's drink count value

SLTI T3 T2 4 ; ON IF Player has 3 or less drinks
BNEZ T3 LeftChoice
NOP

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Player Index
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; 
LI A1 20 ; Coins

BNEZ V0 checkstar ; Check Star Location if 20 Coins or more
NOP

checkspacesremaining:
LUI T0 hi(cur_player_spaces_remaining)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(cur_player_spaces_remaining) ; Address of spaces remaining
LW T0 0(T0) ; Load Value


LI T1 3
BEQ T0 T1 checkitems
NOP
LI T1 7
BEQ T0 T1 checkfor20coins
NOP
LI T1 9
BEQ T0 T1 checkfor0coins
NOP
J exit
NOP

checkstar:
LUI T0 hi(current_star_spawn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_star_spawn) ; Address of current Star Spawn Cycle
ADDIU T1 T0 1 ; Address of first Star Spawn Index in the Cycle
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load Index of Star Spawn to T0
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get address of current Star Spawn Index
LBU T2 0(T0) ; Load current Star Spawn Index to T2

LI T9 7
BEQ T2 T9 LeftChoice ; Branch IF it's Star 07
NOP
J checkspacesremaining
NOP

checkbank:
LUI T0 hi(bank_coin_total)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(bank_coin_total) ; Address of current bank total
LH T0 0(T0) ; Load Value

SLTI T1 T0 10 ; ON IF Bank has less than 10 coins
BNEZ T1 RightChoice
NOP
J LeftChoice
NOP

checkitems:
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LB A0 29(S4) ; Player Index
LUI T1 hi(0xFFFFFFFF)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0xFFFFFFFF) ; No Item Value
BNE V0 T1 LeftChoice ; Left if full
NOP
J checkbank
NOP

checkfor20coins:
LB A0 29(S4) ; Player Index
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 20

BEQZ V0 LeftChoice ; Pick Left if no coins 
NOP
J RightChoice
NOP

checkfor0coins:
LB A0 29(S4) ; Player Index
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 1

BEQZ V0 RightChoice ; Pick Left if no coins 
NOP
J LeftChoice
NOP

LeftChoice:
BEQZ S3 CalculateChance
LI A0 50 ; 50%
LI T9 1 ; Normal Difficulty
BEQ S3 T9 CalculateChance
LI A0 30 ; 30%
LI T9 2 ; Hard Difficulty
BEQ S3 T9 CalculateChance
LI A0 3 ; 3%
J CalculateChance
LI A0 0 ; 0% Super Hard Difficulty

RightChoice:
BEQZ S3 CalculateChance
LI A0 50 ; 50%
LI T9 1 ; Normal Difficulty
BEQ S3 T9 CalculateChance
LI A0 70 ; 70%
LI T9 2 ; Hard Difficulty
BEQ S3 T9 CalculateChance
LI A0 97 ; 97%

LI A0 100 ; 100% Super Hard Difficulty 

CalculateChance:
JAL RNGPercentChance ; 0 = Left - 1 = Right
NOP 

BNEZ V0 GoRight
NOP

LI A1 Left_chain_index
J SetDecision
LI A2 Left_chain_space_index

GoRight:
LI A1 Right_chain_index
LI A2 Right_chain_space_index

SetDecision:
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LBU A0 29(S4)



exit:
LW S3 68(SP)
LW S4 72(SP)
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; NAME: (Junction) Right Sand Slide Entrance
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Left
; PARAM: Space|Right

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S4 72(SP)
SW S3 68(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1

LBU T0 23(S4) ; Status Flags

additionalbgcode.code:
; Customize the background used each turn!
; This function runs at the start of each turn.
; The default background is available as DEFAULT_BG.
; Additional backgrounds are available as ADDITIONAL_BG_#,
; e.g. ADDITIONAL_BG_1 for the first added background.
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

;JAL Rainhook
;NOP

; Return the background index in V0.
LI V0 DEFAULT_BG

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80


;===Insert Rainhook===
.align 16
Rainhook:
ADDIU SP SP -72
SW RA 68(SP)

LUI T0 hi(HookData)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(HookData)
LW V0 0(T0) ; Load HookData operation
LUI V1 0x8000 ; 0x8000000
ORI V1 V1 0xE7F0 ; 0x8000E7F0, address in main game loop
SW V0 0(V1) ; Insert rainhook to CustomCode in main game loop

LW RA 68(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 72

;===Hook Data===
.align 16
HookData: ; Rainhook to jump to CustomCode in main game loop
J CustomCode


;===Custom Code===
.align 16
CustomCode:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW T0 32(SP)
SW T1 28(SP)

LUI T0 0x800D ; 0x800D0000
LW T0 0xC3DC(T0) ; Load value from 0x800CC3DC
BEQZ T0 Skip ; If 0x800CC3DC == NULL (not in board play), skip
NOP
; else, run custom code here

JAL DehydrateCheck
NOP

Skip:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW T0 32(SP)
LW T1 28(SP)
J 0x8000E7C0 ; Resume main game loop
ADDIU SP SP 40



.align 16
DehydrateCheck:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP) ; Loop Counter
SW S1 68(SP) ; Current Player's Drink Count
SW S3 64(SP) ; Current Player's Forced Roll Address
SW S4 60(SP) ; Current Player's Index

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; At V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player 

LBU A0 15(V0) ; Chain Index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; at V0
LBU A1 16(V0) ; Chain Space Index

LUI T0 hi(SpaceArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(SpaceArray)
SpaceLoop:
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load the first Space Index of the Array

BEQ T1 R0 Continue ; if 0, exit
NOP

BEQ V0 T1 DisplayMessage
NOP

J SpaceLoop
ADDIU T0 T0 1

Continue:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A1)
ADDU S1 S1 V0 ; Add Current Player's Index to get Drink Count

LUI S3 hi(0x800CDBD2)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(0x800CDBD2) ; P1 Forced Roll Address

LI T2 0x4C ; Distance between each player's addresses
MULT V0 T2 ; Multiply Current Player Index by T2
MFLO T2 ; Move Result to T2
ADDU S3 S3 T2 ; Add to get current Player's Forced Roll address

LBU T0 0(S1)
BNE T0 R0 notdehydrated
NOP

LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter
LOOP:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Rand Int 0-99 at V0
NOP

LI T0 5
DIVU V0 T0 
MFHI T1
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; add 1 to get a 1-5 number
SB T1 0(S3) ; Store Forced Roll

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to the Loop Counter
LI T2 1
BNE S0 T2 LOOP ; exit when the counter hits 1 (Dehydrate 1 Dice Block only)
ADDIU S3 S3 1

J DisplayMessage
NOP

notdehydrated:


DisplayMessage:
;JAL Main
;NOP



LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S3 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
SpaceArray:
.byte 0x3F,0x38,0x3B,0x3D,0x42,0x3C,0x41,0x3A,0x40,0x39,0

.align 16
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -0x80
SW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
;
JAL CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts
NOP
LI s0, 0x800D1108
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0003 (s0) ;load character ID 1
SW v0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp) ;store drink amount for p1 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x003B (s0) ;load character ID 2
SW v0, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;store drink amount for p2 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x0073 (s0) ;load character ID 3
SW v0, 0x0020 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x0024 (sp) ;store drink amount for p3 to stack
;
JAL GetPlayerNamePtr
LBU a0, 0x00AB (s0) ;load character ID 4
SW v0, 0x0028 (sp)
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;big hardcode 0x02 alignment
SW s1, 0x002C (sp) ;store drink amount for p4 to stack
;
JAL MainsPrintf
NOP
LW ra, 0x0070 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0074 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0078 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 0x80

.align 0x10
MainsPrintf:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x60
SW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
SW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
SW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
SW a2, 0x003C (sp)
SW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
SW S0, 0x002C (SP)
SW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
SW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
;
LW a2, 0x0070 (sp) ;load character 1 ptr from stack
LW a3, 0x0074 (sp) ;load character 1 drink amount ptr from stack
LW a0, 0x0078 (sp) ;load character 2 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp) ;store character 2 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x007C (sp) ;load character 2 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x0014 (sp) ;store character 2 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0080 (sp) ;load character 3 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0018 (sp) ;store character 3 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0084 (sp) ;load character 3 drink amount ptr from stack
SW a0, 0x001C (sp) ;store character 3 drink amount ptr to stack
;
LW a0, 0x0088 (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0020 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
LW a0, 0x008C (sp) ;load character 4 pointer from stack
SW a0, 0x0024 (sp) ;store character 4 pointer to stack
;
SW r0, 0x0028 (sp) ;terminate sprintf
;
LI a0, 0x800977C0 ;where to store result
LUI a1, hi(DrinkPrintingFormatters)
ADDIU a1, a1, lo(DrinkPrintingFormatters) ;ptr to format to use
JAL sprintf
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A5) ; First RAM address with Item
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A5)
LI S0 0 ; Loop Counter

drinkdisplayloop:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; once all 3 items checked, exit
NOP

LI T0 -1 ; 0xFF
LBU T2 0(S1) ; Load Item's Index from RAM
BEQ T0 T2 drinkdisplayloop_exit ; if 0xFF, exit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4
JAL PlayerHasItem ; V0 = -1 if Item is NOT found
LBU A1 0(S1)

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; add 1 to check next address
LI T1 -1
BNE T1 V0 drinkdisplayloop ; If item is found, loop to check next
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; add 1 to counter

drinkdisplayshowmessage:
SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI T1 0x41800000
SW T1 28(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1, hi(0x800977C0)
ADDIU A1, A1, lo(0x800977C0)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A5)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A5)
J MainsPrintf_exit
SB A0 3(T0)

drinkdisplayloop_exit:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD0A8) ; Window ID RAM Address
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD0A8)
JAL 0x800EC9DC
LBU A0 0(T0)
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J drinkdisplayshowmessage
NOP

MainsPrintf_exit:
LW S0, 0x002C (SP)
LW S4, 0x0028 (SP)
LW S1, 0x0024 (SP)
LW ra, 0x0030 (sp)
LW a0, 0x0034 (sp)
LW a1, 0x0038 (sp)
LW a2, 0x003C (sp)
LW a3, 0x0040 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x60

.align 0x10
GetPlayerNamePtr: ;takes arg a0, character ID
;returns pointer to player name on v0
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
LUI s0, hi(CharacterNamesNormal)
ADDIU s0, s0, lo(CharacterNamesNormal)
SLL a0, a0, 0x0004 ;multiply character ID by 0x10
ADDU v0, a0, s0 ;pointer to character name is on v0 now
LW a0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0014 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
CharacterNamesNormal:
.asciiz "MARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "LUIGI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "PEACH"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "YOSHI"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "WARIO"
.align 0x10
.asciiz "DK"
.align 0x10

.align 0x10
.asciiz "DAISY"

/**
CharactersEnum
{
0x00 - Mario
0x01 - Luigi
0x02 - Peach
0x03 - Yoshi
0x04 - Wario
0x05 - DK
0x06 - Waluigi
0x07 - Daisy
}
**/
.align 0x10
CopyPlayerDrinkAmounts: ;copy drink amounts from board ram to
;label PlayerDrinkAmounts
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
SW v0, 0x0014 (sp) ;counter
SW s0, 0x0018 (sp) ;pointer to read from
SW s1, 0x001C (sp) ;pointer to store to
LI s0, 0x800CD0A1 ;pointer to drinks (big hardcode)
LUI s1, hi(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ADDIU s1, s1, lo(PlayerDrinkAmounts)
ORI v0, r0, 0x0000 ;init counter
DrinkAmountLoop:
LBU t0, 0x0000 (s0) ;load current drink amount
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0030 ;convert int to string
SB t0, 0x0000 (s1) ;store current drink
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to drink pointer
ADDIU s1, s1, 0x0002 ;add 2 to PlayerDrinkAmountsPointer
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x0001 ;add 1 to counter
SLTI t0, v0, 0x0004 ;exit if v1 is equal to v0
BNEZ t0, DrinkAmountLoop
NOP
LW t0, 0x0010 (sp)
LW v0, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x001C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20

.align 0x10
DrinkPrintingFormatters:
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 1
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 1
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 2
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 2
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 3
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 3
.byte 0x0A ;\n
.ascii "%s " ;Character name 4
.ascii "%s"  ;Drink amount 4
.byte 0x00

.align 0x10
PlayerDrinkAmounts: ;you will need to store player drink ;amounts in the 1st byte of each row
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
.byte 0x00, 0x00 ;2nd 0x00 terminates the string
